statements.select: select tb_wlphck_ID, tb_wlphck_wlbs, tb_wlphck_wlph, tb_wlphck_cplb, tb_wlphck_mingc, tb_wlphck_jiagdm, tb_wlphck_cjcl, tb_wlphck_bfb, tb_wlphck_kdlk, tb_wlphck_storagemslk, tb_wlphck_storagewzlk, tb_wlphck_ftime, tb_wlphck_zzl, tb_wlphck_kyzl, tb_wlphck_wpbs, tb_wlphck_yt from tb_wlphck where tb_wlphck_ID = $value$

select tb_wlphck_ID, tb_wlphck_wlbs, tb_wlphck_wlph, tb_wlphck_cplb, tb_wlphck_mingc, tb_wlphck_jiagdm, tb_wlphck_cjcl, tb_wlphck_bfb, tb_wlphck_kdlk, tb_wlphck_storagemslk, tb_wlphck_storagewzlk, tb_wlphck_ftime, tb_wlphck_zzl, tb_wlphck_kyzl, tb_wlphck_wpbs, tb_wlphck_yt from tb_wlphck

select tb_wlphck_ID, tb_wlphck_wlbs, tb_wlphck_wlph, tb_wlphck_cplb, tb_wlphck_mingc, tb_wlphck_jiagdm, tb_wlphck_cjcl, tb_wlphck_bfb, tb_wlphck_kdlk, tb_wlphck_storagemslk, tb_wlphck_storagewzlk, tb_wlphck_ftime, tb_wlphck_zzl, tb_wlphck_kyzl, tb_wlphck_wpbs, tb_wlphck_yt from tb_wlphck
statements.insert: insert into tb_wlphck ( tb_wlphck_wlbs, tb_wlphck_wlph, tb_wlphck_cplb, tb_wlphck_mingc, tb_wlphck_jiagdm, tb_wlphck_cjcl, tb_wlphck_bfb, tb_wlphck_kdlk, tb_wlphck_storagemslk, tb_wlphck_storagewzlk, tb_wlphck_ftime, tb_wlphck_zzl, tb_wlphck_kyzl, tb_wlphck_wpbs, tb_wlphck_yt ) values ( #tb_wlphck_wlbs#, #tb_wlphck_wlph#, #tb_wlphck_cplb#, #tb_wlphck_mingc#, #tb_wlphck_jiagdm#, #tb_wlphck_cjcl#, #tb_wlphck_bfb#, #tb_wlphck_kdlk#, #tb_wlphck_storagemslk#, #tb_wlphck_storagewzlk#, #tb_wlphck_ftime#, #tb_wlphck_zzl#, #tb_wlphck_kyzl#, #tb_wlphck_wpbs#, #tb_wlphck_yt# )
statements.update:
update tb_wlphck set
tb_wlphck_wlbs = #tb_wlphck_wlbs#,
tb_wlphck_wlph = #tb_wlphck_wlph#,
tb_wlphck_cplb = #tb_wlphck_cplb#,
tb_wlphck_mingc = #tb_wlphck_mingc#,
tb_wlphck_jiagdm = #tb_wlphck_jiagdm#,
tb_wlphck_cjcl = #tb_wlphck_cjcl#,
tb_wlphck_bfb = #tb_wlphck_bfb#,
tb_wlphck_kdlk = #tb_wlphck_kdlk#,
tb_wlphck_storagemslk = #tb_wlphck_storagemslk#,
tb_wlphck_storagewzlk = #tb_wlphck_storagewzlk#,
tb_wlphck_ftime = #tb_wlphck_ftime#,
tb_wlphck_zzl = #tb_wlphck_zzl#,
tb_wlphck_kyzl = #tb_wlphck_kyzl#,
tb_wlphck_wpbs = #tb_wlphck_wpbs#,
tb_wlphck_yt = #tb_wlphck_yt#,
where tb_wlphck_ID = $tb_wlphck_ID$
